title: Potatoes
creator_credit: Robert Lang, Roman Bittman and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This documentary deals with the gradual shift from the family farm, to corporation-run farms, with all the ensuring problems and personal hardship. It is an incisive evaluation of what is happening in North America particularly St Johns Valley of New Brunswick and in world wide agriculture today.
